EmailTemplate.name: 17.ComColl.SDP.none.N.G.N.14762.SDP Pilot campaign.SSE_CXO_3_Solutions_Brochure
EmailTemplate.subject: One package can completely transform your network!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Enable new services simply and securely As the CXO of your company, we know profitability is a key business concern- and we want to help make your job easier. Read our solution brochure and discover how Nokia Secure Service Enablement provides many benefits to ensure profitability. This brochure will touch on topics including:
- Strengthening security and performance - Attracting new customers and keeping them - Bringing simplicity and agility to your operations Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
